elementSpec.desc: defines the range of allowed values for a feature, in the form of an fs, vAlt, or primitive value; for the value of an f to be valid, it must be subsumed by the specified range; if the f contains multiple values (as sanctioned by the org attribute), then each value must be subsumed by the vRange.
当該素性の値がとる範囲を示す．

remarks.p: May contain any legal feature-value specification.
